reviews.review: Buy Razer Hydra Motion Controller.

今回のシングルはストーリーがすごく優れていたと思う。
出てくるものはすべてロボットですが、そのユニークな言動や作りこまれたモーションによってすごく人間味あふれるキャラクターに仕上がっています。
ストーリーも起承転結がしっかりしていてなんだかピクサーのCGアニメを思い出すようなゲームでした。Good.

Sequência fodástica do já foda Portal e que trouxe inovações de inovações de inovações (portalinception). Tudo aqui foi fantástico, do início ao fim. A storyline é engraçada e intrigante, o ambiente ficou bem menos linear do que o primeiro e os personagens continuaram sendo as estrelas do jogo.

Destaque para o Co-Op com missões somente possíveis com auxílio de amigos.

SPACE!

Nota 10/10

its hard and has a huge lerning curve but its worth it but i recommended play with a friend who also just got P2 so you don't have a more experieced random plyer take all the fun out of playing like a few did to me.
It's fucking Portal 2! What isn't there to recommend?!

It truly is an intriguing and engaging game that is hard to put down.  The single-player is awesome on its own, and the co-op has seriously had me dying laughing when I accidentally smashed my partner into a screen and then slid him into toxic sludge! :D
Da avere. Tutti. Stop.

For the original asking price of $50, no thanks - sure it looks great, has lots of character, and if you loved Portal, then this is a shoo in - but for $15 the 3-5 hours you'll get out of the story will be awesome. You'll want to go back for more, and drag a friend with you into co-op.

Jedna z tych gier w którą każdy powinien zagrać, nie tylko dla samej zabawy jaką są łamigłówki ale również ciekawej fabuły i zabawnych dialogów - kluczowych elementów, dla których tytuł ten jest absolutnie unikalny. Nie wiem jak u Was, ale u mnie Portal zawitał do czołówki.
way longer than the first. pretty damn good

In my opinion, whilst not quite as good the first Portal, it's still worth your while to purchase this game.  The main problem really is that it has to live in the shadow of what is its predecessor, but on its own it excels and it really pulls you in with only really urgent outside events able to drag you away.

игра на все 100!
и затягивает и голову ломаешь и кооперотив зашибенный!
советую всем кто хочит хорошо пороскидывать мозгами;)
Una obra maestra que deberia estar en un museo...

Toujours aussi excellent, cet opus est encore plus addictif. L'interaction avec les IA apportent un plus avec des réflexions assez fun. Celles de l'excentrique fondateur d'Aperture sont un must. Vous pourrez par exemple entendre des choses du genre : "Si vous êtes allergique aux cacahuètes, c'est le moment d'avertir quelqu'un, parce que le prochain test va peut être tourner votre sang en jus d'arachide pendant quelques minutes. Le bon côté des choses, c'est que si on y arrive, on aura droit à une nouvelle catégorie de prix nobel rien qu'à nous!". J'ai parfois retrouvé une ambiance folie-scientifique-post-2nd-guerre à la BioShock assez plaisante.
Dobra grafika, ciekawe zagadki i bardzo dobra kooperacja.

Не ожидал что так понравится вторая часть Portal. Это великолепная игра с юмористическим уклоном. Большое спасибо Valve за такую классную игру. Друзья, если вы ещё не играли в Portal 2, то вперёд. Это будет очень интересно!
This game is a really fun one great for puzzle lovers. :)
If the Laws of Physics no longer apply in the future... God Help You.  WAHAHAHAHAHA!!!
Muy buena historia con mucho humor, cooperativo y lo mejor de todo: un fps atípico donde hay que darle al coco.
Забавный мультиплеер, продуманный сюжет, интересные головоломки. Отличное продолжение первой части
Portal 2 - шедевр. Советую всем в неё поиграть!

Portal 2 feels like that warm feeling you get when you poop and the process goes very smoothly. 
9/10
Super gra serdecznie polecam

The game of the year nominations and wins are well-deserved. This is a must play. Clever, challenging (without ever being too difficult, you start to figure out what little tricks they use to steer you in the right direction), and with the best comedic writing I've ever seen in a video game, everyone must play this game!
一开始价格不太合适，作为V社拥护者，终于以合理价位拿下，期待COOP~

Absolutely astounding game.  The multiplayer is so-so, nice and fun but not really noteworthy.  The singleplayer though, amazing.  The storyline was gripping, I found myself a little dissapointed that it was over so soon.  The graphics and art design is second to none, the levels do an excellent job conveying the storyline.  Also the sound design is probably the best I've seen, really underrated.  5/5
Um dos melhores puzzles que já joguei. Leve, intuitivo e em alguns momentos bem dinâmicos. Sem falar da possiblidar de jogar com um amigo em co-op. Sensacional.
Awesome story, and plenty of challenges that are fun.  Cave Johnson makes for another memorable character.  My only complaint is how difficult it is to see the next location to go.

Hmm.. This is a tough recommendation. 
On one hand, this game is fun from beginning to end; no doubt in my mind. This game is an amazing blend of actors voicing intriguing characters, jokes, music, well defined game mechanics, and puzzle solving. In addition there is a Co-op feature.

On the other hand, I find myself beating this game in about 7 hours the first time through, 4 hours the second time. Not a lot of replay-ability even with Co-op... But is it too short? or just short enough before it becomes monotonous and loses its charm.
Final Rating ~ 9/10

I recommend to valve for P3, make a Co-op optional campaign.
Pura e simplesmente sensacional; melhor final que eu já vi num jogo
Amazing game just like the 1st one. Coop is a blast as well. Recommended.
Hilarious, smart, generally awesome. An EXCELLENT follow up to the classic original. Playing through again for a 2nd time 5/5

Como não poderia deixar de recomendar Portal 2? Um jogo que brilha simplesmente pela sua originalidade e beleza. Um "must-have" a todos os amantes do género. E pelo preço... acreditem q é uma verdadeira pechincha!!! Pois ele merece sem dúvida muito mais. Se ainda não o jogaram... estão á espera de quê?
Sweet! a must have
Portal 2. A damn fun game. I heartily recommend this to anybody that enjoyed the first game.
Very fun game, even better than the first one.
why not
Simply one of the  best games ever!

GlaDOS, I've missed you so... 

The levels this time round feel so much more alive now compared to the sterile Portal ones.  The puzzles are a bit too easy perhaps now in  single player as there are some quite obvious wall textures showing up slightly lighter in the areas where you need to place a portal.  

A sequel that actually improves on the original! - yes, you read that right (sequels are usually just a cash in).
Innowacyjna, zupełnie inna gra niż wszystkie. Ciekawie opowiedziana fabuła ze zwrtotami akcji. Świetny humor i znakomity tryb kooperacji.
einfach der hammer !

one of the best games in years 2010, I liked Cooperative very wonderful and fun .. briefly Nice game ,, Professional !!

[h1]My Rating : 10/10[/h1]
FUCKIN' LOVE SARCASM.

Portal 2 won Destructoid's Game of the Year.

What does that mean? IT MEANS YOU SHOULD BUY IT ASAP.
Un juego inteligente, un juego sereno, un juego para admirar!
Great game
ço zevki
It was good until I took a companion cube to the knee.

Das beste Spiel, das ich je gespiel habe!
Mit viel Humor und einer Menge Rätsel übertrifft es den genialen Vorgänger um Längen.

經典續作依舊經典，遊戲在場景、語音、配樂、關卡設計、牆上的塗鴉、幽默的橋段等等各個細節都非常精緻，二代又多了多人合作模式，值得推薦！

Classic is always classic.  Scenes, voice, background music, stage design, draws on walls, humorous dialogs are all so sophisticated.  Moreover, co-op mode is avalible in Portal 2.  Really a masterpiece!!

Très bon jeu ! Si vous connaissez quelqu'un avec qui vous pourez jouer à ce jeu en COOP alors prenez le. 
PS. Faites travailler vos méninges ;) 
Rigolables aux rendez-vous.
awesome
una sola parola per descrivere questo gioco, anzi due: UNA PERLA! Pazzo è chi non lo prova.

По мере прохождения игры Вы не сможете ни на секунду оторваться от монитора, даже на сон. Некоторые из моих знакомых сутками просиживали в ней пока не пройдут тот или иной уровень. Верно говорили, что головоломки стали проще, но гораздо интереснее. Если раньше все было каким-то серым и спустя 4-5 часов игры буквально принуждало ее закрыть и отдохнуть, то в Portal 2 все иначе. Прохождение не займет у Вас более 10 часов, а то и меньше, при этом пролетят они буквально молниеносно, оставив за собой море позитива, да и вообще хороших эмоций.

A damn good game. If you do not have it yet, then i dont like you.
Unfortunately it has lost some of the personality and charm that portal 1 had, but in its stead it gained a polished, well developed world with gameplay that really sets it apart from other AAA titles.
Not to mention the co-op is amazing if you have a friend to play with. I can honestly say that portal 2 allowed Kieza and i to become better (gaming) pals. <3 you kieza,

Очень хорошая игра. Графика на высоте, голоса актеров поражаюст своей харизмой и полностью передают характера героев. Несомненно сильны кооператив со своим, не менее интересным сюжетом. Жаль только что атлас и пи-боди не имеют своего характера и своих реплик. Советую покупать portal 2 всем без исключения.
游戏是给力的，可惜硬盘空间不够了……
With sequels its sometimes a bit of a let down, but valve just seem to always pull it out of the bag. I just completed this game, and my god do i wanna do it again. Get this while its a steal!
Amazing story, amazing voice acting, mind bending puzzles, wonderful co-op. Portal is Portal, so there's no major difficulty, and most of the game is a tutorial. But way better than the first.
Short but epic.
Умная, динамичная, слегка с иронией и незабываемо стильная. Игра года!
Look What you started professor Wertz! I love this game, very cool puzzles!

(For once I'm writing a serious review, holy shit.) This game is quite simply Game of the Year. The humour is top notch, writing perfection comedy wise, and the new gameplay element add a surprising amount to the gameplay. Only bad point i'd say is it's incredibly easy, somehow easier than the first one.
mad as hell, bit of a mind fuck but not to bad

Pro fanouška her od Valve je Portal 2 nezbytnou součástí knihovny, stejně jako třeba Half Life 2. Už jenom základní single player je krásný, promyšlený a originální. 
Co-op tomu dodává ten pravý šmrnc a důvod, proč zakoupit ;)
Makes a great gift for the deranged ex.

Portal 2 réunit deux concepts a priori antagonistes : le jeu de réflexion/puzzle/casse-tête et le fun instantané! Si le mode solo propose une difficultré crescendo en ce qui concerne les énigmes et dispose d'une immersion géniale notamment grâce à sa bande son, c'est bien le mode coopération qui donne au jeu tout son sens. Tout y est parfaitement dosé pour que les joueurs fassent chauffer leur cerveau tout en s'amusant. Un classique.
Portal was simply amazing, now theres a Portal 2 though, well this changes everything...
Great game, one of the best of 2011. Valve does it again! And by "it", I mean "make a game that totally doesn't suck".
Amazingly done sequel to Portal.  Funny, interesting and exciting.  I did NOT see the clever twist at the end coming.
Gioco molto bello e coinvolgente!!
Not just stuff for fans, but intersting and amusing. Fun even if you didn't play the first game, more fun if you did.
More EPIC than Portal and COOP !
Brilliant!

A Triumph. Huge Success. It's hard to overstate my satisfaction.

Both Single Player and co-op modes excel in gameplay. Writing is top notch.

During the experience, I laughed. I cried. I was told I may have suffered a minor case of serious brain damage.

Any fan of the original will have all of their expectations fulfilled, and then some.

To put it simply, this is one of the greatest games made in the year of 2011, if not the whole decade. Do yourself a favor and play this game. It has good graphics, story, gameplay, multiplayer... PLAY IT.
Great puzzle/strategy game that stretches your strategic thinking to the point of explosion! Extra long gameplay and story is worth it!
Play it. For science. You monster!

Valve - боги. Гейб - гений.
Ни одна другая игра не предлагает такой оригинальности и простоты геймплея вкупе с прекрасным сюжетом и подачей. Эпичное начало, эпичный сюжет, наиэпичнейшая концовка. Разработчики превратили бездушных роботов в колоритных персонажей и населили чуством юмора. В дополнение ко всему блестящий кооператив. Это победа, Valve. Portal 2 - это пожалуй самая интересная и оправданная игра 2011 года.
Моя оценка - 10/10. Portal 2 - это яркий пример того, как надо делать игры. 
Однозначно игра года.

It's Valve. It's Portal. Need I say more? Okay, if you insist. It has a great story: entertaining, quirky, and just feels very much like the original while still being much longer and more complete. The gameplay is much more straight forward, so puzzles often have one possible solution and only one unlike the original which often has many choices, however, if the designers weren't so limiting I imagine many of the puzzles would be near impossible to solve, much less enjoy. Well worth the money.
Amazing gameplay, amazing atmosphere, amazing humor, amazing game.
WHY THE FUCK IS THERE A TRAILER FOR A SHITTY SPEILBURG MOVIE IN HERE???
Очень атмосферная игрушка.
I loved playing this game. The dialog from the two characters is brilliant and hilarious. Figuring out how to solve the puzzles to get through each level was also a lot of fun.
This game is deffenetly worth each peni you pay for it. A must have.

This is my favorite game.  At least, for the time being. I first bought it for my kid--thanks to all those snazzy commercials--and it has become a family addiction. I haven't played co-op mode nearly enough since I can't get my kid to stop playing it without some type of punishment involved. So only on weekends and not on school nights, okay? That gives me a chance to play. LOL

[h1]8/10[/h1]
Стоящий сюжет, лучше чем в Халф-лайф 2, валв продемонстрировали рост в этом плане.
Но геймплей в середине проседает и наскучивает.

Это лучшая игра за всю мою жизнь.
Она верх совершенства.
Сама наука.
Science at it's best.
Newtonian mechanics in its funniest form.
Игра на порядок интереснее первой части, при том что первая часть тоже - шедевр. Ничуть не жаль потраченного времени, игра стоит того и потраченных на неё денег. Рекомендую.

Hello, and welcome to this Aperture Science Interactive Electronic Entertainment Product Endorsement.

Portal 2 is the sequel to Portal, the game in which the player was given cake and nobody tried to murder the player by raising the player's body temperature by 4000 degrees celcius.

Please note that the Aperture Science Hand-held Portal Device will again be your primary means of interaction with the environment, but this time the challenge has been modified to suit your mental capacity and the Aperture Science Plot Exposition and Entertainment Generator has been overloaded to deliver a superior narrative experience.

In controlled experiments 96% of test subjects laughed out loud during the execution this Interactive Electronic Entertainment Product. The remaining 4% were found to be dead from neurotoxin-related trauma. Aperture Science disclaims and denies any and all responsibility for injury or death incurred during or subsequent to testing procedures.

This is one of the better games I have played. The story line was fantastic and I found myself laughing out loud at some of the story line comments as they were very funny. The maps were not super hard where you got frustrated. I think they walked a fine line to make the maps fun without being super hard to figure out.

I've played 3 hours in co-op and i just love that function that i can play with a friend and that we can talk and discuss what to do next. its just too bad i can't play the game anymore. sent steam a message about it. with no response its been just over a week. :( Tells me when i verify the game cache that i have to download a 18.5mb file and when i do it doesn't fix the game at all. so i verify it again and tells me i need to download it again i've done this 5-6 times with no luck. :(
Jedna z nejlepších her roku 2011. Ano, jsem konkrétní jak někteří naši politici, ale přece byste si ode mne taky nenechávali vysvětlovat, že mít pár milionů dolarů je fajn.
Good puzzle action and a nice story

well when i completed the campaign on my p3 when psn was hacked in april i had SO MUCCH FUN. then when it went up i was uing the console coontrols i love so much to play agianst my mate who was on steam via psn. if you know the story it's easy to follow and your'll be even happier. if your new to it yourll undestand the story and will also love it. endless humour and random moments but i can see why it has game of the year material (or even the centruy) tho HL2 is it's key rival
Aperture Science. We do what we must because we can.
